Message.Title: software is 2% of dell revenue
Message.Msg: hardware profits are disappearing... software profits can't make up the difference soon enough this is death for dell... razor thin margins on 98% of the business

Topic.Title: sorry mike, its end of story for dell

Message.Msg: I see the stock going to $5. Too bad Steve Jobs isn't around to return the kind words of Michael Dell in 1997 " “What would I do? I’d shut it down and give the money back to the shareholders,”

Message.Title: can someone please tell me
Message.Msg: seriously michael dell, please close it up and distribute the cash to the shareholders before there is nothing left!!! this is unbelievable!!!

Wakeup this stock is being shotred and manipulated to drive you out in order to pickup cheap shares. Down another .25 in after hours,just more BS. Hang on until after earnings and you will be rewarded.
